1.title: Redierment Home

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The gang tries to rescue Jenny from the retirement home, but when Atticus' disgruntled minion Bob uses the book to create a feast that makes everyone who eats it hungrier, they're forced to fight an army of seniors hungry for human flesh.

2.title: The Student Body

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: A girl desperate to make friends uses the book, giving herself vine-like tendrils that brainwash and ensnare anyone she touches.

3.title: Daddy Tissues

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Jenny's father, now out of his coma, tries to join the gang, but when he's rejected, he uses the book to steal people's skin and disguises himself as various male students to infiltrate the gang.

4.title: Simply the Beast

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: When cheerleaders start disappearing from the school hallways, leaving only their shredded uniforms behind, the gang becomes convinced that they've been eaten by a mysterious creature called The Beast.

5.title: Jungle Fever

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: An environmentalist fanatic becomes fed up with the littering going on at the school and uses the book to turn the school and everyone in it prehistoric.

6.title: Fisting Fantasy

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: After being embarrassed in an online game by Todd and Curtis, a student uses the book to turn the school into a live-action RPG which the gang must battle through.

7.title: See You Later, Masturbator

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Jimmy is fired for peeping on girls in the changing room and Todd vows to clear his name, but the gang find the real culprit difficult to identify - because he's invisible.

8.title: Loser Generated Content

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The A/V Club use the book to turn the gang's lives into a psycho thriller, and they cast Jenny as the victim and Todd as the killer.

9.title: Deathday Cake

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: The gang make plans for a surprise party for Curtis's birthday, while a Puritan girl uses the book to make herself a giant birthday cake that eats students on their birthdays.

10.title: 2 Girls, 1 Tongue

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: The Phantom of Crowley High returns and switches roles with Hannah to get Curtis back. The three dudes realize that Todd must lose his virginity to become the Pure Evil One. Atticus comes to terms with his past. And nobody can stop singing.

11.title: B.Y.O.B.O.P.E.

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Todd and Curtis try to lose their virginity at a house party, but things go south when Atticus shows up uninvited.

12.title: The Toddyssey

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: When a paraplegic student uses the book to give himself fast legs, Todd jumps on his back and gets transported to the future, where Atticus has taken over as Satanic Overlord.

13.title: Black Tie Showdown

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Atticus takes the book and brainwashes the students of Crowley High to do his bidding, forcing a showdown with Todd at the semi-formal. Secrets are revealed, romances blossom and tragedy strikes, threatening to tear apart the gang for good.

1.title: Todd the Metal God

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Todd finds the Book of Pure Evil and uses it to become a better guitar player in an attempt to win his dream girl Jenny away from her douche-bag boyfriend. But along with making him a better guitar player, it also turns Todd evil.

2.title: How to Make a Homunculus

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Hannah uses the book to create a homunculus as a science project for the upcoming science fair, but the creature, which for some reason looks like Todd, breaks free. Todd, Curtis, Jenny and Hannah form a gang to stop the book.

3.title: Rock N' Roll Zombies Know Best

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: A goth girl named Marcy uses the book to summon her favorite rock stars from the dead, but the zombie rock stars eat her parents and she's forced to keep them in her basement and feeds them with guys that she lures over to her house.

4.title: Gay Day

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: A bullied gay student at Crowley High uses the book to make every other guy at school gay, including Todd and Curtis, while making himself straight. Atticus attempts to glimpse Todd's penis to try and find the mark of the Pure Evil One.

5.title: Monster Fat

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The fattest girl in school uses the book to become skinny, but her leftover fat creates a monster that turns all the other girls in the school fat. Jenny becomes fat and Todd has to prove to her that his feelings for her aren't shallow.

6.title: Invasion of the Stupid Snatchers

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: A slow-witted student uses the book to become the smartest kid in school, so the book creates a "stupid smoke" that makes everyone who breathes it stupid except for him, much to the amusement of stoners Curtis and Todd.

7.title: Terrible Twin Turf Tussle

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Jenny begins a lesbian relationship, causing the girl's jealous twin sister to use the book, creating clones armies of the sisters who battle it out in the school hallways. Hannah creates Todd a special suit so he can sense Pure Evil.

8.title: Cockfight

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: A bully with a small penis is enraged when Todd sends a picture of it around the school. He uses the book to give himself a mammoth member, which goes out of control and starts turning anyone who looks at it to stone, starting with Curtis.

9.title: Big Bad Baby

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: A girl uses the book to get pregnant, but the book accelerates the pregnancy, ending in a giant baby wreaking havoc in the halls of the school. Todd tries to reason with the baby and prove to Jenny that he could be a good father.

10.title: The Ghost of Chet Sukowski

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: A basketball player uses the book and gets possessed by a ghost from the 1950's, causing him and Jenny to fall for each other. He challenges Todd to a suicidal drag race for Jenny's heart, for which the gang soups up Atticus' van.

11.title: The Phantom of Crowley High

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: A girl uses the book to become a better singer, but the spell backfires and her tongue falls out. She becomes the Phantom of Crowley High and Curtis falls for her. Meanwhile Atticus, Todd, and Jenny try to whip up a heavy metal musical.

12.title: Checkmate

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: A genius chess player gets his hands on the book and forms a bizarre cult in the chessnasium, convinced that Todd is the Pure Evil One come to bring about the apocalypse. The cult tries to lure Todd into a trap to destroy him.

13.title: A Farewell to Curtis' Arm

episode of.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Curtis uses the book to give himself a new giant evil arm. Todd must face the truth about his evil destiny as he fights Curtis, and Jenny learns the truth about her father. Atticus tries to regain his place among the Satanists.

imdb.title: Todd and the Book of Pure Evil

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

plot: A stoner metalhead named Todd Smith, his crushee Jenny, his best friend Curtis, and the geeky Hannah, search their high school for a mayhem-causing Satanic spell book, while being opposed by Atticus, the evil guidance councillor.::Anonymous
